title: Sao Tome and Principe
description:
National name: República Democrática de São Tomé e Príncipe

Government

Republic.

Geography

The tiny volcanic islands of São Tomé and Príncipe lie in the Gulf of Guinea about 150 mi (240 km) off West Africa. São Tomé (about 330 sq mi; 859 sq km) is covered by a dense mountainous jungle, out of wh...
